group_1.textLeft: Ugh, geeze...
I can't find a trace of Miwarin's magic anywhere!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I can't sense it at all...

group_1.textLeft: Jun's known her longer than us.
Are you having an easier time detecting it?

group_1.textRight: I'm not picking up on anything, either...
It didn't seem like she noticed us, but...
Who knows, maybe she did, and now she's@running away...

group_1.textLeft: I would really prefer to spread out and search,@but it doesn't seem safe to do so.

group_1.textRight: Y-yesss... This magic reaction is so strong...

group_1.textLeft: It even makes me suspect whether@Alina's Witch survived...

group_1.textRight: We defeated it and got the Grief Seed,@didn't we?

group_1.textLeft: This is just my bae's guess, but he thinks@this one grew here.

group_1.textRight: Grew here...?

group_1.textLeft: On top of the increase in crimes and accidents...
We went ahead and unleashed Alina's Witch,@right?
Maybe that attracted other Witches.
He thinks this one might've sucked up the@impurities left behind from the Witch we beat.

group_1.textRight: Then, perhaps the Witch that suddenly vanished@yesterday was also consumed by this one...
*Sigh*... We could have known, had we@given it a little more consideration...
The combination of Miwa's magic, our negligence,@and your strategy all gave rise to this disaster...
I-I don't think you need to beat yourself up@over it, Lady San...

group_1.textLeft: It's a fact that I neglected my duties as a@Magical Girl. There's no excuse for that.

group_1.textRight: I don't know...

group_1.textLeft: ёБжЙЩЭГНKЕKЕKЕ

group_1.textRight: Th...th-th-they appeared!
Miyu, keep ahold of yourself!
[surround:3046A04][chara:7106:effect_7000_attack01]Raah!

group_1.textLeft: [surround:3046A05][chara:7106:effect_7002_damage01][bgEffect:shakeLarge]ЧЗЩKA!?

group_1.textRight: This is...
[surround:1029A05][chara:7106:effect_7001_attack02]Get away from me!

group_1.textLeft: [surround:1029A06][chara:7106:effect_7003_damage02][bgEffect:shakeLarge]ЭНЯЁЩUHAH!?

group_1.textRight: I think I can beat it...!

group_1.textLeft: This looks like a piece of cake!
Honestly, it seems like this Witch is the same as the@last; It's clearly tough and all, but the minions aren't.
So why don't we try splitting up?

group_1.textRight: Yes, I agree with Her Highness. All we must do@is catch up with Miwa.
Be prepared to communicate telepathically@at a moment's notice and disperse.
Once we find Miwa, we'll trace each others'@magic and regroup.
How does that sound?

group_1.textLeft: Kyahaha★
That's our instructor for you! This cutie's totally@okay with that!
Everyone, if you see Miwarin, get in touch with@everyone else!

group_1.textRight: Understood...!
Yes...!
